summary: The 3rd millennium is a period of time that started on January 1, 2001 and will end on December 31, 3000 of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: In contemporary history, the third millennium is a period of time that began on January 1, 2001, and will end on December 31, 3000 of the Gregorian calendar. It is the third period of one thousand years in the Anno Domini or Common Era.
title: 3rd millennium
